snippet: “Chaplin,” a new musical about the life and career of Charlie Chaplin, is to begin previews at the Barrymore Theater in August.
abstract: “Chaplin,” a new musical about the life and career of Charlie Chaplin, is to begin previews at the Barrymore Theater in August.

headline.main: 'Chaplin' Musical Tramps Its Way to Broadway
headline.print_headline: ‘Chaplin’ Musical Tramps Its Way to Broadway
